children.value: It will pass. Just keep breathing.
I’m sorry you are struggling with this.
It’s OK to feel this way.
We have all the time in the world.
Let’s go get some fresh air.
I understand it’s something that you can’t control.
You won’t feel this way forever, I promise.
You are stronger than anything you are afraid of.
Try to focus your energy on what you can control.

parameters:
"Click my mouth for an affirmation.
Click my orbs to create soothing melodic combinations."
